mean_en: a tube that has mirrors and loose pieces of colored glass or plastic inside at one end so that you see many different patterns when you turn the tube while looking in through the other end
sentence_trans: 当转动这个万花筒时，你可以看到各种有趣的多彩图案。
word_etyma: kal\u003dcal美丽 ＋ eido形状 ＋ scope视野 → kaleidoscope万花筒
